alert.note: Alert for Brookings (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 10:20PM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota...Minnesota... Big Sioux River below Dell Rapids affecting Minnehaha County. Rock River at Luverne affecting Rock County. Big Sioux River near Trent affecting Moody County. Sixmile Creek near Brookings affecting Brookings County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Iowa... South Dakota... Big Sioux River above Hawarden affecting Sioux, Union and Lincoln Counties. Big Sioux River near Brookings affecting Brookings and Moody Counties. Big Sioux River at Akron affecting Plymouth and Union Counties. Split Rock Creek near Corson affecting Minnehaha County. Rock River at Rock Rapids affecting Lyon County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Sixmile Creek near Brookings. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1635.0 feet, township roads northeast of Brookings begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 1634.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:15 PM CDT Sunday was 1634.8 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 1634.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Sixmile Creek Brookings 1634.0 1634.7 Sun 10 pm MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning.
